title: Location, Community, Quality Living
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Affinity at Olympia.', 'A refreshingly new option for the 55+ crowd.', 'A different kind of community.', 'At Affinity at Olympia we’ve created a new kind of 55+ lifestyle community for people who are ambitious about the years ahead and aren’t willing to compromise their freedom.', 'Rents start at $1350, which include utilities, WiFi, expanded television services, swimming pool, hot tub, workout facilities, pub, and more than 30,000 square feet of extra living space to play, create, exercise and socialize.', 'Write one check and you’re done.', 'There’s no need to buy-in or sign a lengthy contract—you can simply rent—at a very affordable price.', 'When the travel bug bites, just lock your door and go with total peace of mind and complete security.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Deposit:', 'Depending on apartment size', 'Leasing options:',
